response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to both of us, with an estimated worth of $15,000. Considering its high value and the opportunity it presents, I am extending you a special offer to acquire this product at a price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the mutual benefits this product could bring to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14000}
